dmca.title: Kappa Sigma Wants Google Pledged to Remove Links to Ritual Book
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam:

Kappa Sigma Fraternity has received information that the operators at the web site of the domain listed above, which appears to be a server under your control, are offering unlicensed copies of, or are engaged in other unauthorized activities that infringe upon the rights of the copyright in a book owned by Kappa Sigma Fraternity.

I. The copyrighted material for which we seek protection is a book entitled "The Ritual of Kappa Sigma." The copyright owner of the book is the Kappa Sigma Fraternity.

2. Google.com searches provide access to websites offering unauthorized copies of the material via the following searches:

(a) Search Inquiry: Kappa Sigma.rar

Infringing Web Pages:

http://www.onlytorrents.com/torrent/kappa-sigma-ritual-book:7c370330fdbd8c44f2cb0f2055fa03509I 7f0f76
